import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; // Import useNavigate instead of useHistory import './Header.css'; import logo2 from '../../asserts/log.png'; // Make sure this path is correct import LogoutButton from '../../main/Logout/LogoutButton'; // Adjust path if necessary const Header = () => { const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); // useNavigate hook useEffect(() => { // Check if user is logged in (this is a simple example, adjust as needed) const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken'); setIsLoggedIn(!!token); // Update based on your auth logic }, []); const handleLogout = () => { // Clear the token from localStorage or any other logout logic localStorage.removeItem('authToken'); setIsLoggedIn(false); navigate('/'); // Navigate to home or any other page after logout }; return (

{isLoggedIn ? ( <> ) : ( <> )}
); }; export default Header;
